text: He mominaharu! Jaba timi nasako avasthama hunchau ta namaja che'u pani naja'u jabasam'ma timi aphno mukhabata uccarita sabdaharu bujhna thaldainau ra apavitratako avasthama snana nagaresam'ma pani namaja napadha. Tara yadi yatra garirakheko bha'e kura arkai cha, ra yadi timi virami chau athava yatrama chau va timimadhye kohi saucabata a'eko cha athava timile svasnisamga sahavasa gareka chau ra timila'i pani upalabdha chaina bhane pavitra mato li'i mukha ra hatama sparsa garera tayam'muma gari (namaja padhihala). Nihsandeha allaha trutiharu mapha garnevala tatha ksamadata cha
